title: University Management System
description: A database management system for universities to store and manage data for students, courses, and enrollments. Features RESTful API endpoints for CRUD operations.

title: Black Board
description: A real-time multi-user collaborative drawing web application with simultaneous drawing on a shared canvas with instant synchronization across clients.

title: E-Code Verifier
description: A cross-platform mobile application for extracting ingredients information of packaged food using E-Code. Features two-step authentication, E-Code scanning and verification.

title: SmartHaat
description: A web application for buying and selling of livestock, targeting farmers and traders. Features product listings, search/filtering, shopping cart, order management, and admin panel.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Astro and Tailwind CSS. Features blog system, contact form with CAPTCHA, and CI/CD pipeline.
